body.p: Entity A invests in a junior AAA‑rated tranche of a residential mortgage‑backed security on 1 January 20X8 (the issue date of the security). The junior tranche is the third most senior of a total of seven tranches. The underlying collateral for the residential mortgage‑backed security is unguaranteed non‑conforming residential mortgage loans that were issued in the second half of 20X6.
